quote: Thank you for loving me like you love me. Thank you for showing me that we don't always have to be strong to be there for each other--that it's okay to be weak, so long as we're there.
quote_letters: THANK YOU FOR LOVING ME LIKE YOU LOVE ME THANK YOU FOR SHOWING ME THAT WE DONT ALWAYS HAVE TO BE STRONG TO BE THERE FOR EACH OTHER--THAT ITS OKAY TO BE WEAK SO LONG AS WERE THERE
